1.2.name: wordpress/creative-clans-embed-script
1.2.description:
A minimalistic plugin that lets you add scripts to any page or post. The scripts will be added to the beginning and/or end of the 'content' of the page/post.

A very easy way to add for example Google Adwords conversion tracking code to a page. And with the new feature, you can also use it to add the Google Website Optimizer code and splittest your landingpages.
